sentence.text: Here, we report a reduction of histone deacetylase 3 (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II) protein amounts in eutopic endometrium of infertile women with endometriosis compared to a control group.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Reduction of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II abrogated decidualization in a primary culture of human endometrial stromal cells (hESCs) similar to that observed in infertile patients with endometriosis.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Collectively, we found attenuation of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II and overexpression of collagen muscle organ development I in the eutopic endometrium of infertile patients with endometriosis.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
